version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.
Enjoy more seamless shopping experience including easier checkout!
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

Brand new design of the Lazada app with new features including:
- Personalised recommendations of categories, products and brands, all tailored JUST FOR YOU
- Flash sales with new offers frequently updated throughout the day
- Extensive and improved search filter and suggestion to quickly find what you’re looking for

Brand new design of the Lazada app with new features including:
- Personalised recommendations of categories, products and brands, all tailored JUST FOR YOU
- Flash sales with new offers frequently updated throughout the day
- Extensive and improved search filter and suggestion to quickly find what you’re looking for
- New Product Listing page for convenient browsing and simpler voucher redemption
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

- Same quality products and low prices

- Same great experience on a new app
